name: Notion Keyboard Shortcuts (100+ Shortcuts)
description: Get improved day by day!What is this?This is a Notion Keyboard Shortcuts template that contains tons of shortcut actions along with its keyboard shortcuts.Tailored specifically for Notion beginners who want to learn more about Notion.Why this template is created?Based on my personal experience, I felt the hassle of jumping back and forth from Notion help center to the desktop app just to find the right shortcuts that I wanted.Also, there was no such template regarding this topic at the time.What
